rules_text:
Choose one. If you control a planeswalker, choose any number instead.
• Return target spell with mana value 3 or less to its owner's hand.
• Target player draws two cards.
• Arcane Mastery deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text:
[i]“It almost bothers me how easy I make this look.”
—Archmage Jessica Turin[/i]
